articles.title: Alaska files documents opposing Eklutna tribal gaming push
articles.description: ANCHORAGE, Alaska (AP) — The state of Alaska has filed documents opposing a tribe's push to open a gaming hall north of Anchorage.

articles.title: Delpit caps unusual season for LSU with trip to title game
articles.description: Grant Delpit has had an unusual season.
articles.content:
Grant Delpit has had an unusual season.
LSU's star safety switched positions early in the year to compensate for an injured teammate. Later in the season, he was the injured player and the Tigers' defense suffered from Delpit being limited by a sore ankle.

articles.title: Man gets prison for stealing home deed without signing loan
articles.description: BARTOW, Fla. (AP) — A Florida man was sentenced to prison for trying to steal a new $219,000 home by snatching and filing a signed deed without signing loan documents.
articles.content:

articles.title: Teen pleads not guilty in fatal Colorado school shooting
articles.description: CASTLE ROCK, Colo. (AP) — A teenager charged with first-degree murder and other charges in a school shooting that killed one student and injured eight others pleaded not guilty on Thursday.
articles.content:
CASTLE ROCK, Colo. (AP) A teenager charged with first-degree murder and other charges in a school shooting that killed one student and injured eight others pleaded not guilty on Thursday.

articles.title: 'Affluenza' teen jailed in Texas for probation violation
